description.french: Dépassez la vitesse maximale de la combinaison
description.italian: Superare la velocità max. dell'EVA
description.spanish: Supera la velocidad máxima de EVA
description.brazilian: Ultrapasse a velocidade máxima do EVA

description.french: Évitez les 10 électrocutions
description.italian: Evitare di essere fulminato 10 volte
description.spanish: Evita electrocutarte 10 veces
description.brazilian: Evite ser eletrocutada 10 vezes

description.english: Travel the maximum survivable distance from the CEREBRUM Hub
description.german: Bewege dich so weit wie möglich vom CEREBRUM-Hauptknotenpunkt weg
description.french: Parcourez la distance viable maximale depuis la place centrale de CEREBRUM
description.italian: Raggiungere la distanza max. dalla piattaforma CEREBRUM
description.spanish: Viaja a la mayor distancia donde sea posible sobrevivir desde el núcleo de CEREBRUM
description.russian: Выживите на максимально возможном расстоянии от МОДУЛЯ ЦЕРЕБРУМ
description.brazilian: Percorra a distância máxima de sobrevivência a partir da área central do CEREBRUM

description.french: Récupérez l'objet personnel de McDonagh
description.italian: Raccogliere l'oggetto personale di McDonagh
description.spanish: Consigue el artículo personal de McDonagh
description.brazilian: Colete o item pessoal de McDonagh

description.french: Récupérez l'objet personnel de Lopez
description.italian: Raccogliere l'oggetto personale di Lopez
description.spanish: Consigue el artículo personal de Lopez
description.brazilian: Colete o item pessoal de Lopez

description.french: Récupérez l'objet personnel d'Edwards
description.italian: Raccogliere l'oggetto personale di Edwards
description.spanish: Consigue el artículo personal de Edwards
description.brazilian: Colete o item pessoal de Edwards

description.french: Récupérez l'objet personnel de Hudson
description.italian: Raccogliere l'oggetto personale di Hudson
description.spanish: Consigue el artículo personal de Hudson
description.brazilian: Colete o item pessoal de Hudson

description.french: Récupérez l'objet personnel d'Olivier
description.italian: Raccogliere l'oggetto personale di Olivier
description.spanish: Consigue el artículo personal de Olivier
description.brazilian: Colete o item pessoal de Olivier

description.french: Récupérez la sauvegarde de données du serveur central SPIRITUS
description.italian: Raccogliere il backup dati unità centrale SPIRITUS
description.spanish: Consigue la copia de seguridad de los datos del ordenador central SPIRITUS
description.brazilian: Colete os dados reservas do mainframe SPIRITUS

description.english: Escape the Northstar IV with 2 or less Astronaut Tokens
description.german: Flüchte aus der Northstar IV mit 2 oder weniger Astronaut-Andenken
description.french: Échappez-vous de Northstar IV avec 1 ou 2 objets personnels d'astronautes
description.italian: Evacuare la Northstar IV con max. 2 oggetti degli astronauti
description.spanish: Huye del Northstar IV con 2 objetos personales de astronauta o menos
description.russian: Выберитесь с Нортстар IV, имея не более 2 личных вещей астронавтов
description.brazilian: Escape da Northstar IV com 2 objetos pessoais de Astronauta ou menos

description.english: Escape the Northstar IV with all Astronaut Tokens
description.german: Flüchte aus der Northstar IV mit allen Astronaut-Andenkenn
description.french: Échappez-vous de Northstar IV avec tous les objets personnels d'astronautes
description.italian: Evacuare la Northstar IV con tutti gli oggetti degli astronauti
description.spanish: Huye del Northstar IV con todos los objetos personales de astronauta
description.russian: Выберитесь с Нортстар IV, собрав личные вещи всех астронавтов
description.brazilian: Escape da Northstar IV com todos os objetos pessoais de Astronauta

description.english: Escape the Northstar IV in under 2 hours
description.german: Flüchte aus der Northstar IV in weniger als 2 Stunden
description.french: Échappez-vous de Northstar IV en moins de 2 heures
description.italian: Evacuare la Northstar IV in meno di 2 ore
description.spanish: Huye del Northstar IV en menos de 2 horas
description.russian: Выберитесь с Нортстар IV менее чем за два часа
description.brazilian: Escape da Northstar IV em menos de 2 horas

description.english: Escape the Northstar IV after more than 4 hours
description.german: Flüchte aus der Northstar IV nach mehr als 4 Stunden
description.french: Échappez-vous de Northstar IV en plus de 4 heures
description.italian: Evacuare la Northstar IV dopo più di 4 ore
description.spanish: Huye del Northstar IV en más de 4 horas
description.russian: Выберитесь с Нортстар IV более чем за четыре часа
description.brazilian: Escape da Northstar IV com mais de 4 horas

description.english: Listen to all Audio Logs, Audio Terminals and Intercepted Transmissions
description.german: Höre dir alle Audio-Protokolle, Audio-Terminals und aufgefangene Übertragungen an
description.french: Écoutez tous les logs, les périphériques audio et les transmissions interceptées
description.italian: Ascoltare tutte le registrazioni, i terminali audio e le intercettazioni
description.spanish: Escucha todas las transmisiones interceptadas, todos los registros y todos los terminales de audio
description.russian: Прослушайте все аудиозаписи, аудиотерминалы и перехваченные передачи
description.brazilian: Ouça todos os registros de áudio, terminais de áudio e transmissões interceptadas

description.english: Listen to more than 50% of the Audio Logs, Audio Terminals and Intercepted Transmissions
description.german: Höre dir mehr als 50% der Audio-Protokolle, Audio-Terminals und aufgefangenen Übertragungen an
description.french: Écoutez plus de 50 % des logs, des périphériques audio et des transmissions interceptées
description.italian: Ascoltare più del 50% delle registrazioni, dei terminali audio e delle intercettazioni
description.spanish: Escucha más del 50 % de las transmisiones interceptadas, de los registros y de los terminales de audio
description.russian: Прослушайте более половины всех аудиозаписей, аудиотерминалов и перехваченных передач
description.brazilian: Ouça mais de 50% dos registros de áudio, terminais de áudio e transmissões interceptadas

description.english: Completely repair your EVA Suit before escaping
description.german: Repariere den kompletten EVA-Anzug vor der Flucht
description.french: Réparez totalement votre combinaison avant de vous échapper
description.italian: Riparare completamente la tuta EVA prima dell'evacuazione
description.spanish: Arregla por completo tu traje EVA antes de huir
description.russian: Полностью почините свой скафандр до того как выбраться
description.brazilian: Repare completamente o traje EVA antes de escapar

description.english: Escape the Northstar IV without dying
description.german: Flüchte aus der Northstar IV ohne zu sterben
description.french: Échappez-vous de Northstar IV sans mourir
description.italian: Evacuare la Northstar IV senza morire
description.spanish: Huye del Northstar IV sin morir
description.russian: Выберитесь с Northstar IV ни разу не погибнув
description.brazilian: Escape da Northstar IV sem morrer

description.french: Récupérez l'appareil photo reflex
description.italian: Raccogliere la reflex
description.spanish: Consigue la cámara DLSR
description.brazilian: Colete a câmera DSLR

description.french: Échappez-vous de Northstar IV
description.italian: Evacuare la Northstar IV
description.spanish: Huye del Northstar IV
description.brazilian: Escape da Northstar IV

description.french: Récupérez les 25 SSD HAN-IV de sauvegarde
description.italian: Raccogliere tutti i 25 SSD di Backup di HAN-IV
description.spanish: Reúne las 25 copias de SSD de seguridad de HAN-IV
description.brazilian: Colete todos os 25 SSDs reservas da HAN-IV

description.french: Activez la bague Filtrum HAN-IV
description.italian: Attivare l'anello del FILTRUM DI HAN-IV
description.spanish: Activa el anillo de HAN-IV FILTRUM
description.brazilian: Ative o anel FILTRUM da HAN-IV

description.english: Escape the Northstar IV with between 3 and 5 Astronaut Tokens
description.german: Flüchte aus der Northstar IV mit 3 bis 5 Astronaut-Andenken
description.french: Échappez-vous de Northstar IV avec 3 à 5 objets personnels d'astronautes
description.italian: Evacuare la Northstar IV con 3, 4 o 5 oggetti degli astronauti
description.spanish: Huye del Northstar IV con 3 a 5 objetos personales de astronauta
description.russian: Выберитесь с Нортстар IV, имея от 3 до 5 личных вещей астронавтов
description.brazilian: Escape da Northstar IV com 3, 4 ou 5 objetos pessoais de Astronauta
